name: web-token/jwt-bundle
description: JWT Bundle of the JWT Framework.

suggest.web-token/jwt-checker: Add header and claim checker managers as Symfony services.
suggest.web-token/jwt-console: Add Keys (JWK) and Key sets (JWKSet) management commands for your Symfony console.
suggest.web-token/jwt-encryption: Add Encrypted tokens (JWE) support and useful Symfony services.
suggest.web-token/jwt-key-mgmt: Add Keys (JWK) and Key sets (JWKSet) management tools.
suggest.web-token/jwt-signature: Add signed tokens (JWS) support and useful Symfony services.
suggest.symfony/serializer: Use the Symfony serializer to serialize/unserialize JWS and JWE tokens.
